name: Jessica Stearns
text: I’ve had too many bad experiences to count at this point. A few weeks ago my pizza box was soaked in oil that had spilled out of the box from my breadsticks. Tonight I ordered at 11pm and it is now 12:20 and my pizza has still not been delivered even though the estimated time was 40-50 min. This location is the absolute worst.

name: Larry Kramer
text: Don't get Papa John's very often, but when we do it's a treat.  Wish they were in our area.  The pizza itself is really good compared to other chains and the prices are very reasonable.  The garlic sauce tips the scales.  Makes a great pizza even better.

name: Anna Dunn
text: Seems like the quality has gone down since they started offering the new deal to compete with Domino's. My cheese wasn't even melted. Not good when the cheese is still in the same shredded form. Second time asking for extra sauce and it's …More

name: Charles Kim
text: I ordered here online--they made me wait unnecessarily for 15 extra minutes, and then when I got my order, the pizza was cut sloppily, our poppers were undercooked. and our jalapeno pepper was shriveled up. Such a shame, as the actual food …More

name: Aaron Giese
text: Great pizza.  I really like their crust.  I ordered with the app because it’s 2018, and that’s what you do. I went to pick it up, no problems.  They always have good coupons in the app too.  Don’t listen to the bad reviews.  Those people …More

name: Jacob Kre
text: 99% sure some meth head is working for them, I ordered a large cheese pizza, they gave me a medium with sauce caked all over. So much sauce the cheese was sliding off, not to mention all of the crust became a soggy disgusting mesh. Wish I …More

name: Joi B.
text: Easy online ordering. Pizzas were delivered under the estimated time and were still piping hot. Driver was friendly. Pizzas were delicious.

name: Crystal Bessler
text: Tried to use Lynx Win 50% off and didn’t get the discount.  We got our pizzas and called the manager who responded “well, how much did you think you should pay?”  Our two pizzas came to $34 (we got a $9 discount) but pretty sure that was …More

name: Mike Pohlkamp
text: I ordered takeout online to bring home to my family on my way home from work. I got there towards the end of the amount of time they told me it would be ready.  When I got there, the worker said it should be coming out of the oven soon, …More

name: Sally Love
text: Just picked up a pizza. It was very busy. My order was messed up and about four people who came after me got their pizza before me. Of course I had a concert to get to so I asked the adult whom I assume was the manager. She snapped at me, …More

name: Nicole D
text: Placed an order at 11:35 AM with an estimated delivery between 20 - 30 minutes.  Website showed our order was out for delivery with new estimated delivery of 12:25 - 12:35 PM.  Called at 12:37 PM and was informed that they only had two …More

name: Raymond Shepard
text: First time I ordered from Papa John's. I've tried all the other local options. 30 minutes from ordering to my door step. The pizza was hot and great. Frankie's, Broadway, Pizza Man and Domino's all failed to deliver a hot pizza and last …More

name: Sean Allen
text: Great customer service and food I will continue to be a customer. I would recommend this store to others. Keep up good work!

name: Steven W
text: Pretty spot on. Orders are delivered correctly and fairly quickly. We are on the edge of their boundary so it adds 5 extra minutes than our friends to the north. Not complaining, just physics people.

name: Gagandeep Bahel
text: This is a horrible place to order pizza. I have been to many other papa john's stores in Minneapolis but never had such bad experience. First of all they gave wrong pizza. Toppings were not what I ordered and when I called for it they did …More

name: Rose Harrison
text: This location used to be awesome. Now, there’s a new GM and he’s arrogant and his staff is always “training” when the pizza is wrong, super late (projection says 15-25 minutes on App, actual time the pizza is ready? 45-60 minutes... and …More

name: AnaLea Poppe
text: the worker there didnt say his name but told me to do a online order instead of a phoning a order. i tried to order my pizza and he hung up on me over the phone while i was talking. i have never been so disappointed for customer service

name: James Crawford Jr
text: Waited hour and a half & nothing. I called and Christina said sorry we don’t deliver there after she told me they did earlier. Bad location

name: Jackie Starr
text: Probably would have been better if he wasn't sick. I applaud the attempt

name: David Robison
text: I was over charged by $10 and my Bleu cheese was open.

name: Jerriesha Floyd
text: Order pizza tonight and when I got it the order was wrong. I called the store and asked for the pizza to be remade correctly. When the driver brought the new pizza out he put it on my lobby floor. This is unacceptable and I will be filing a complaint with corporate. I spoke to the store manager and he was not very helpful.

name: Tadd Parris
text: Tasted good and finished on time for pickup.

name: lisa jacques
text: Friendly people & great customer service

name: Gina Rengstorf
text: Pizza has tasted great the times I have ordered!  We order from everyone to get a variety and Papa John's was tasty!  Service was great!

name: Khalil khalil
text: Don't buy from this location .. the worst Pizza ever .I AM GETTING MY MONEY BACK

name: Renee Vento
text: Staff is unfriendly and not well trained. When I arrived to pick up the pizza I had ordered over the phone it hadn’t even been put in the oven yet. Was told it would be 15 mins. No apology. They didn’t even check me out at the register while I was waiting....

name: Anonymous Anonymous
text: Good pizza every time we order. Fast delivery and good prices.

name: Slime Time Johnson
text: Plymouths PJs phones were not working.   just called maple groves PJs to confirm that the store was even still there..! A very pleasant  (sarcastic HORN) employee answered the phone,  and informed me in a very nice way (sarcastic HORN) …More

name: Brianna Peterson
text: This is the second time I've ordered pizza and half of it isn't cooked. I used to work at a papa john's and if a pizza was like this there is no way we would have sent it out the costumer! I can't believe it's still raw dough.

name: KD
text: Woman answered the phone in such a rude manner I didn't even order. If you can't put a lid on your irritation then maybe customer service isn't the job for you!

name: Dana Menard
text: Passable pizza... Otherwise, meh.

name: Jon Hunter
text: Ordered a pizza and some wings for delivery. Gave them my address and phone number, they told me it would be 45 minutes to an hour. Waited an hour and a half until I called. Spoke to some half wit that told me the reason I didn't get my …More

name: qwest 4one
text: The pizza is great the management is terrible

name: Rick Gass
text:
Absolutely terrible service and knowledge about process & product
Choose another option

name: Jacob Williams
text: That buddy guy was fantastic! Id give 5 if i could get anchovies.

name: Matt Teiken
text: Last time I went it took me 15 minutes just to wait in line to pick up the pizza that was waiting behind the counter for me.  Stopped going here after that.

name: Matthew Larson
text: Awesome pizza love it

name: Birds On Clouds
text: Good pizza

name: Jason Buckendahl
text: Awesome

name: Rhonda Engle
text: When we don't feel like cooking it's Papa John's!

name: Mike Wagner
text: Good pizza

name: Wyatt P
text: Dude that talked to me on the phone was a ass whole Jared should be fired!

name: Chris Compton
text: Good pizza

name: Obadiah Nyabuto
text: Helpful staff

name: Miranda Earley
text: Pizza was like nothing I've ever eaten before

name: Noah Newbauer
text: The orders take longer than other pizza places and the service seemed forced. I won't be ordering her again.

name: thomas tovrea jr
text: Had to go with poor cuz they just kept putting me on hold then not answer.???!! Screw'em if they don't want my money.
